question.text: Read the following statements and mark the incorrect statement regarding cardiac muscle.

options.text: It is a contractile tissue present in heart
They are not under the control of will of the animals

solution.text: The muscles in our body are divided into three groups: Skeletal muscles, Smooth muscles and Cardiac muscles. Skeletal muscles are voluntary and striated. Smooth muscles are involuntary and non striated. Cardiac muscles are related to heart. These are structurally similar to skeletal muscles but functionally similar to smooth muscles. Structural similarities include presence of striations and peripheral nuclei. Similarities between smooth and cardiac muscles is both are involuntary and show uninucleate fibres.
